name: HDFC Bank Alerts
subject: IMPORTANT: KYC Update Required Immediately
body: Dear Customer, Your KYC details are pending update. As per RBI guidelines, your account will be frozen if not updated within 24 hours. Please visit your nearest branch or log in to netbanking to submit the required documents. Regards, HDFC Bank.

action_item.task: Submit KYC details or visit nearest branch to update account

reply:
Dear HDFC Bank Alerts,

I think there's been a misunderstanding - I'm not a customer of HDFC Bank, nor do I have an account with your institution. I'd appreciate it if you could refrain from sending me future emails regarding my non-existent account. Perhaps you could update your email list with more accurate contact information?

Best regards,

name: OceanAI (MariApps Marine Solutions)
subject: Selection Update - Next Round
body:
Dear Anush Jain,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the next round of our selection process at OceanAI (MariApps Marine Solutions Private Limited).

Your performance in the previous round was impressive. We will be sharing the details regarding the schedule and format of the next round shortly.

Congratulations and best of luck!

Warm regards,
HR Team
OceanAI

action_item.task: None

reply:
Dear Anush Jain,

We are delighted to hear that you have been shortlisted for the next round of our selection process. Your performance in the previous round was indeed impressive, and we are eager to see your progress in the next stage.

To confirm, we will be sharing the details regarding the schedule and format of the next round with you shortly. If there's any specific information you need in the meantime or would like to clarify, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Once again, congratulations and best of luck in the next round. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
The HR Team

name: Priya Sharma (HR)
subject: Diwali Celebration & Rangoli Competition
body: Hi Team, We are hosting a Rangoli competition tomorrow at 4 PM in the cafeteria. Traditional wear is encouraged. Snacks (Samosas and Jalebis) will be served. Attendance is mandatory for the town hall at 5 PM. Let's make this festive!

action_item.task: Host Rangoli competition in the cafeteria

reply:
Hi Priya, 

Thank you for organizing the Diwali celebration and Rangoli competition. I'm looking forward to participating in the event and representing our team's creativity. I'll make sure to attend the town hall meeting at 5 PM as required. Please let me know if there's an agenda for the meeting so I can come prepared.

Best regards, 
[Your Name]

name: Zomato
subject: You + Biryani = ❤️
body: Hey Anush, We saw you looking at that Biryani yesterday. Why play hard to get? Order now and get 40% off. Your stomach called, it wants a treat.

action_item.task: None

reply:
Dear Zomato Team,

I'm flattered by the personalized attention, but I'm not quite ready to surrender to the allure of discounted Biryani just yet. Maybe you could work on perfecting your algorithms to understand the nuances of human hunger (and dating lives).

Best regards,
[Your Name]

name: Dr. Mbogo
subject: URGENT: INHERITANCE CLAIM $5,000,000
body: Dearest Beloved, I am the executor of a large estate. You have been named beneficiary. Kindly click this link http://bit.ly/claim-money-now to provide your bank details and pay a small processing fee. God Bless.

action_item.task: Click the link to provide bank details and pay a small processing fee

name: Amit Verma
subject: Urgent: Production Issue - Login Failed
body: Hi Anush, We are seeing a spike in 500 errors on the login page. Clients are escalating. Please look into the logs immediately and update the status on the bridge call.

action_item.task: Look into the logs of the login page

reply:
Dear Amit,

I've been made aware of the production issue with the login page and I'm currently reviewing the logs to identify the root cause. I'll update the status on the bridge call as soon as I have more information. Can you please provide me with more details on the nature of the 500 errors and any recent changes made to the system? I'll work with the team to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

name: Finshots
subject: Why is gold shining again?
body: In today's story, we discuss why central banks are hoarding gold and what it means for your portfolio. Plus, a quick look at the EV market slump.

action_item.task: None

name: Raju (Intern)
subject: Mistake in DB...
body: Sir, I think I accidentally deleted the 'test_users' table, but now the main app is not working. Is 'prod_users' linked to it? Please help, I am scared.

action_item.task: Restore or recreate the 'test_users' table

name: Apple Support
subject: Your Apple ID has been locked
body: We detected unusual activity on your account. Your ID will be deleted in 12 hours. Verify your identity here: http://apple-verify-secure.com/login. Do not ignore.

action_item.task: Verify your identity on the given link

reply:
Dear Apple Support,

I think there may be some confusion. Apple's official support email address is support@apple.com, not @apple-id-lock.com. I'm not sure what's going on here, but I'm pretty certain my ID isn't going anywhere. If you'll excuse me, I have to go verify my identity... with myself. Please, for the love of all things digital, be real.

Best regards,

name: Swiggy
subject: It's raining! Chai pakoda time?
body: The weather demands it. Hot tea and crispy pakoras delivered in 20 mins. Don't fight the feeling.

action_item.task: Order hot tea and crispy pakoras for delivery

subject: Pick up cousin

action_item.task: Pick up Rohan from the train station
